taskbody.prereq: Triple'A Plus must be already installed on your machine.

step.cmd: To start the Triple'A Plus server, right-click the line Embedded Server ([server name]) on [port number] in the Server view pane and choose Start.
step.stepresult: A cmd window is opened, which is the output of the application server. The server is up when the message Server started in RUNNING mode is displayed in the window. This can take several minutes.

step.cmd: After the message Server started in RUNNING mode is displayed in the window, log on to your local machine.
Start your browser and enter the URL according to your installation. For example, http://localhost:15000/wui/activity.
To stop the Triple'A Plus server, right-click the line Embedded Server ([server name]) on [port number] in the Server view pane and choose Stop.
step.stepresult: The server is stopped and the cmd window is closed.

taskbody.postreq: If the server has been stopped outside of Design Studio, the interface continues to display a running status. To continue, stop it using the Server view pane and the start entry becomes available again.
